body:
High reliability nodes running mining pools and merchants have no need to serve BIP37 bloom filters. Implementing the unnamed NODE_BLOOM BIP will allow nodes to display their willingness (or not) to serve SPV clients in this manor, allowing BIP37 functions to be disabled protects from [major denial of service problems](https://github.com/petertodd/bloom-io-attack). Not all nodes today support BIP37  and it is a hindrance that there is no signaling possible for it. 

http://sourceforge.net/p/bitcoin/mailman/message/31298904/

The service identifier would need to be altered from the original specification by @petertodd  as the specified bit has since been used by NODE_GETUTXOS in another client.
title: Implement NODE_BLOOM, ability for nodes to disable serving BIP37 SPV clients.
